historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 3(e) of New Convention Center Hotel Emergency Amendment Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-186, August 12, 2009, 56 DCR 6967).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 18-78, see notes following § 10-1202.01.

DC CODE § 10-1221.14

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Mayor may designate recovery zones pursuant to sections 1400U-1, 1400U-2, and 1400U-3 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, approved February 17, 2009 (123 Stat. 348; 26 U.S.C. §§ 1400U-1, 1400U-2, and 1400U-3).
Square 370, having been determined to be an area of general distress, is designated as a recovery zone.

title.text: Parks, Public Buildings, Grounds, and Space. (Refs & Annos)
